comments_since_last_sample.body: Call of Duty: Vanguard is something i really hope they analyze soon. Though it might mean Jonathan will take a year long break from the channel to recover from the things he'll see in that game.
We need his reaction to COD Vanguard campaign weapons authenticity versus the alternative reality that is the Vanguard multiplayer weapons mods etc.
